name: Espresso
description: Rich and bold espresso with deep caramelized aroma. Best enjoyed with steamed milk or plain.

name: Mocha
description: Mocha blends espresso, chocolate, and steamed milk for a smooth, sweet, and creamy experience.

name: Americano
description: Espresso diluted with hot water for a mellow, clean taste — perfect for those who love lighter brews.

name: Cappuccino
description: Perfectly balanced espresso, steamed milk, and frothy foam — a creamy classic.

name: Latte
description: A smooth mix of espresso and steamed milk topped with light foam — mild and comforting.

name: Macchiato
description: Espresso “marked” with milk foam — bold flavor with a touch of creaminess.

name: Vienna
description: A delightful mix of espresso topped with whipped cream.

name: White Coffee
description: Smooth and light-bodied coffee brewed with lightly roasted beans.

name: Espresso
description: Strong, rich, concentrated coffee shot that defines bold flavor.

name: Drip Coffee
description: Classic brewed coffee with a balanced and smooth profile.

name: Black Eye
description: Drip coffee with a double shot of espresso — strong & intense.

name: Red Eye
description: Drip coffee boosted with a single shot of espresso for extra kick.

name: Cafe au Lait
description: Brewed coffee mixed with steamed milk for a creamy balance.

name: Turkish Coffee
description: Finely ground coffee boiled with strong, deep aromatic flavor.

name: Lungo
description: A longer espresso extraction with a smooth yet bold aftertaste.

name: Ristretto
description: A short, more concentrated espresso shot with intense richness.

name: Cortado
description: Equal parts espresso and warm milk, perfectly balanced.

name: Affogato
description: Vanilla ice cream drowned in a shot of hot espresso.

name: Flat White
description: Velvety textured milk blended with a strong espresso base.

name: Iced Latte
description: Chilled coffee and milk with ice — refreshing and smooth.

name: Irish Coffee
description: Hot coffee with Irish whiskey, brown sugar, and cream topping.
